decks.notes: The deck focuses on aggressive creatures and burn spells to quickly deal damage to the opponent and win the game. By utilizing cheap creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Burning-Tree Emissary, along with efficient burn spells like Play with Fire and Atarka's Command, the deck aims to apply constant pressure and finish off the opponent before they can stabilize. Additionally, cards like Reckless Bushwhacker and Monstrous Rage provide additional reach and damage potential to close out games. The mana base is designed to support the aggressive game plan with a mix of lands that come into play untapped.

The main focus of this deck is to aggressively control the board and deal damage quickly using powerful creatures like Bloodtithe Harvester and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse. It also includes a mix of removal spells like Fatal Push and Go for the Throat to eliminate threats from the opponent. The deck aims to apply pressure early on with efficient creatures and disrupt the opponent's strategy with discard spells like Duress and Thoughtseize. The mana base is designed to support a consistent curve and protect against opposing strategies with cards like Blightstep Pathway and Sulfurous Springs.

The deck focuses on controlling the game by generating card advantage, disrupting the opponent's strategy, and eventually overwhelming them with powerful threats. It utilizes a wide range of spells and creatures to maintain board presence and outvalue the opponent. Yorion, Sky Nomad serves as a versatile companion that provides additional value and flexibility. The deck aims to outlast the opponent and take control of the game by leveraging its resources effectively and capitalizing on powerful synergies.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly ramp up your mana with cards like Llanowar Elves, Elvish Mystic, and Gilded Goose to play powerful cards like Bolas's Citadel and Collected Company. Utilize creatures like Priest of Forgotten Gods, Woe Strider, Catacomb Sifter, and Mayhem Devil to control the board and pressure your opponent. The inclusion of cards like Boseiju, Who Endures and Glissa Sunslayer adds versatility and protection against control decks. Overall, this deck aims to overwhelm your opponent with aggressive plays and efficient mana usage.
